mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, email, age, department, created_at, active) SELECT CONCAT('user_', LPAD(x, 6, '0')), CONCAT('user', x, '@company.com'), 20 + MOD(x, 40), CASE WHEN MOD(x, 5) = 0 THEN 'Engineering' WHEN MOD(x, 5) = 1 THEN 'Marketing' WHEN MOD(x, 5) = 2 THEN 'Sales' WHEN MOD(x, 5) = 3 THEN 'HR' ELSE 'Finance' END, DATEADD('DAY', -MOD(x, 365), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), CASE WHEN MOD(x, 10) = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END FROM SYSTEM_RANGE(1, 500000)
